n = 5000

All prime natural numbers
that are palindromes in thier binary form
and less than 5000:

  3 (11)
  5 (101)
  7 (111)
  17 (10001)
  31 (11111)
  73 (1001001)
  107 (1101011)
  127 (1111111)
  257 (100000001)
  313 (100111001)
  443 (110111011)
  1193 (10010101001)
  1453 (10110101101)
  1571 (11000100011)
  1619 (11001010011)
  1787 (11011111011)
  1831 (11100100111)
  1879 (11101010111)
  4889 (1001100011001)
